channel.title: 562 HUGE help needed (UPDATED)
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt] UPDATED [/size][/b]
currently trying to fix up a 562 server using pkmadness's source by crezzy, it had tons of errors and nulls when i got it and i fixed majority of them. im stuck with 3-4 big errors at the moment to at least get the server decently running.
1. my first error is huge, the hp and prayer bar next to the minimap are nulled/stuck at 0 for all players/levels and i cannot seem to find where the problem is ive spent hours upon hours searching through all my handlers/files and i have a pretty good knowledge base with coding so far.
http://gyazo.com/eec7ab863310e60bd2123893bb88d15a
PLEASE ADD ME ON SKYPE I NEED HELP ASAP! skype:vosse916
